title: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Training and Certification Course Online
description: Mindmajix Microsoft Dynamics CRM training helps to build your skills and knowledge for a career as a Microsoft Dynamics CRM developer. You will gain in-depth knowledge of CRM application modules, customization, configuration, integration, deployment types, etc., and hands-on experience in building and customizing Dynamics CRM through real-life projects.
what_will_learn: |Navigating and Working with Microsoft Dynamics CRM|Primary functionalities of Dynamics CRM components|Creating and managing CRM exercises and records|Using CRM cases to track client benefit issues|
prerequisites: What are the prerequisites for the MS Dynamics CRM course?Knowledge of Customer Relationship Management (CRM) basics is enough to learn MS Dynamics CRM.
target_students: |Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Consultant|Information Technology (IT) Consultant|Software Consultant|Data Analyst|Senior Technical Consultant|
instructor_bio: Passion towards teaching made Irfan share the industrial experience he has got for further generations. He has got a total of three years into the real-time industrial background and has trained over 350+ students.

title: SIEBEL CRM Admin Training
description: Mindmajix Siebel CRM Admin training makes you an expert in Siebel CRM server configuration and performance monitoring with practical examples. You’ll learn how to administer component groups, parameters, configuration files, component definitions, etc., with hands-on sessions. You’ll also master various mechanisms for monitoring system and also how to use application deployment manager to migrate application customizations between Siebel Enterprises. Enroll now and get certified.
what_will_learn: |Installing and setting up Siebel tool, client, and database connections|Understanding various CRM objects|Customizing business applications, objects, components, links, views, joins, eScript, and screens |Testing the customization|Setting up server tasks and components|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the SIEBEL CRM Admin course?




There are no prerequisites for learning SIEBEL CRM admin course. Anyone who is interested in learning this technology can enroll for the training.

title: SIEBEL CRM Training
description: Mindmajix Siebel CRM training advances your skills in designing, developing, and managing Siebel CRM applications. You’ll explore Siebel architecture, functionality, configuration, workflow, etc., through real-time use cases and practical examples. This training also offers hands-on projects to strengthen your skills and clear the Siebel CRM certification exam.
